Farm life inspiration for Holly Hutchinson’s Rural Duty exhibition in Gisborne https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/24/farm-life-inspiration-for-holly-hutchinsons-rural-duty-exhibition-in-gisborne/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/24/farm-life-inspiration-for-holly-hutchinsons-rural-duty-exhibition-in-gisborne/ Kim ParkinsonCapturing the innocence of a young child who sees the farm as his playground. Called Rural Delivery it features photos taken of a young boy in a farm setting which she has colour-graded to achieve a painting-like quality.
